  Generate documentation for your CLI.

---

# Docgen

Generate documentation for your CLI as easy to read Markdown file(s).

## Configuration

First, set the location for oneRepo to look for your templates.

```js {3-5}
setup({
	core: {
		docgen: {
			// config
		},
	},
}).then(({ run }) => run());
```
